article_title: Dr. Anil Jasinghe Appointed as New Secretary to the Ministry of Health and Media
article_body_paragraphs: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake appointed Dr. Anil Jasinghe as the new Secretary to the Ministry of Health and Media.
The official appointment letter was handed over to Dr. Jasinghe by the Secretary to the President Dr. Nandika Sanath Kumanayake this afternoon (10) at the Presidential Secretariat.
